nodes.name: Armored Slaves
nodes.summary: Beast races can wear boots and closed helmets

nodes.name: LootMania
nodes.summary: You have a chance to find additional leveled (random) loot.

nodes.name: Rag n'wahs
nodes.summary: Enemies are knocked back on killing hits

nodes.name: Blast Shield
nodes.summary: Physical barriers protect against AoE spells

nodes.name: Quick Wheel
nodes.summary: Quick access wheel like in modern games

nodes.name: Gamma
nodes.summary: Allows you to adjust gamma, saturation and luminance

nodes.name: Eternal Shine
nodes.summary: Adds a glowing halo to all physical lights

nodes.name: Falling n'wahs
nodes.summary: Realistic gravity and fall damage

nodes.name: HeartStrings
nodes.summary: Total Music Overhaul

nodes.name: Assassin's Crit
nodes.summary: The Dark Brotherhood will start attacking you after reaching a certain level of reputation and will not stop attacks until they are destroyed

nodes.name: Constant enchantment limit
nodes.summary: Do you like to decorate yourself with artifacts like a Christmas tree? Then this mod is not for you.

nodes.name: Impact Sounds
nodes.summary: How did we play Morrowind for 20 years without this mod?

nodes.name: Main Menu Overhaul
nodes.summary: Improves the main menu: 4 mods in 1

nodes.name: Buff Bars
nodes.summary: Adds bars for your buffs and debuffs

nodes.name: AntiTodding
nodes.summary: Don't let your coding become Todding

nodes.name: PvP
nodes.summary: A combat based on parries and dodges. Enemies fight almost like real players.

nodes.name: ShieldsUp
nodes.summary: Active shield block, arrow block

nodes.name: Pacifist
nodes.summary: Want to get someone else's equipped item? Now you don't have to kill. Be a pacifist - just beat this dude half to death!

nodes.name: Parkour
nodes.summary: Comfortable climbing and pushing off walls

nodes.name: AntiBunny
nodes.summary: Realistic jump height

nodes.name: MultiEnchant
nodes.summary: Multi-enchantments will no longer unfairly increase capacity consumption

nodes.name: DragonBreak
nodes.summary: SUPERHOT

nodes.name: Final Strike
nodes.summary: Allows you to make 3 super-attacks: charge, slam and round attack

nodes.name: Combo Master
nodes.summary: Perform fast combo attacks!

nodes.name: Spawner
nodes.summary: Convenient creature spawner

nodes.name: Fast Attack
nodes.summary: Increases weapon attack speed and range depending on your stats

nodes.name: Throw it
nodes.summary: Allows you to throw any weapon

nodes.name: MagicStrorm
nodes.summary: Adds 3 new spell casting modes: spray, ray and shotgun

nodes.name: Armor Rating
nodes.summary: More realistic and smoother formula for calculating armor rating

nodes.name: ManaShield
nodes.summary: The shield magic effect now absorbs physical damage, wasting your mana

nodes.name: Auramancer
nodes.summary: Elemental shields damage everyone around

nodes.name: Fast Cast
nodes.summary: Speeds up spell casting

nodes.name: Runes and Totems
nodes.summary: Ability to create runes on the ground that will explode when enemies are close. Ability to create totems that will shoot magic at nearby enemies.

nodes.name: BattleMage
nodes.summary: Targeted weapon enchantments trigger on attack. Bow enchantments are triggered by an arrow hit. The ability to cast spells when attacking.

nodes.name: Ultra AI
nodes.summary: Combat AI overhaul

nodes.name: Bomberman
nodes.summary: Elemental blasts knock enemies back

nodes.name: Control
nodes.summary: Ability to control magic projectiles and arrows

nodes.name: N'wah Shooter - Marksman Overhaul
nodes.summary: Realistic gravity for arrows. Shaking hands when pulling the string. Multi-shot ability. Arrows stay in objects and ground.

nodes.name: Time Shift
nodes.summary: Bullet-time ability

nodes.name: KickMaster
nodes.summary: The ability to make a kick that deals minor damage to health and stamina and knocks the enemy back

nodes.name: Dash
nodes.summary: The ability to do dash - fast forward, backward or sideways movement

nodes.name: Frenzy n'wahs
nodes.summary: Frenzy spells make enemies attack everyone around

nodes.name: Grip of Death
nodes.summary: Change the grip of the weapon from one-handed to two-handed and vice versa

nodes.name: Double CHIM
nodes.summary: The Gods gave you two hands, and you use them both for your weapon

nodes.name: 4NM_MENU
nodes.summary: Improves the spell creation menu, spell book, adds an alchemical filter

nodes.name: 4NM_PERKS
nodes.summary: Adds passive and active perks for all skills and class bonuses.

nodes.name: HardTrade
nodes.summary: Barter overhaul. Allows you to invest in stores.

nodes.name: 4NM_GMST
nodes.summary: Small mod - big changes

nodes.name: 4NM_RANDOMIZER
nodes.summary: Stats of creatures are set at 80-120% of the norm.

nodes.name: 4NM_STRIKE
nodes.summary: Weapons enchanted "on strike" and "on distant target" now fire a projectile at any attack with it.

nodes.name: Beauty Scrolls
nodes.summary: Replaces magic scrolls icons with lua

nodes.name: HardSave
nodes.summary: You cannot save the game in battle.

nodes.name: DragonDoor
nodes.summary: Enemies are now chasing you through the doors

nodes.name: 4NM_ARMORER
nodes.summary: Ability to improve weapon and armor condition above normal with repair tools. Items improved this way deal more damage and give more armor rating.

nodes.name: 4NM_MAGIC
nodes.summary: Power of all magic is now scaled from many other factors (resistances, skills, attributes, fatigue...). Critical hits for magic. Secondary effects for different damage types. Adds

nodes.name: 4NM_ALCHEMY
nodes.summary: No more drinking over 9000 potions! No more alchemical exploits! No more useless poisons! Poison weapons and throw poison bottles! Rebalancing potion brewing formulas. Beautiful

nodes.name: 4NM_COMBAT
nodes.summary: This is a complete overhaul of weapon combat system. Makes combat truly dynamic and realistic, with every weapon type having it's own unique ability and playstyle. Enhances AI of

nodes.name: 4NM_Training
nodes.summary: The gain of experience in magic skills now depends on the spellcost. The gain of experience in battle skills now depends on damage, hero and enemy levels.Optional: 5 skill points

nodes.name: 4NM - Total Gameplay Overhaul
nodes.summary: Modern gameplay remaster of the game. New perk role-playing system, new game mechanics for leveling, combat, magic, AI, economy, creatures.
